title: Mordekaiser update soon, my opinion, Riot plz listen...
body:
Look Riot, what does every champion in LOL have except for {{champion:82}} ... either cc / gap closers / speed ups / etc. . 

 What would you think he may really need to be viable again? 

I like the tanky giant suit of armor approach, so it would make sense that he would be slow, BUT LOOK AT THAT MACE and all of those SPIKES!!! Why not have his attacks and spells, or when an enemy attacks him, get slowed by all them spikes?

 kinda hard to run when your full of holes and getting hit by a big thing a metal about the size of your typical yordle.
("cough cough, {{champion:111}}'s  anchor , he knocks the daylights out of champs with that anchor passive of his.)
 look what happens when a champ is hit with a big' ol' thing a metal...

If your gonna make him take on more of a tank role, give him some cc, otherwise ill probably chose another tank who has multiple forms of CC. 

{{champion:82}}  can farm like no other! cool! 

but how do you beat a {{champion:82}} ? you can simply run away, or CC him, he can never catch you. He can kill every minion between the both of you, buy he can never catch any champion he chases.

I dunno, I'm not a developer, just a player so maybe none of you will read this...

But even I can see, no, EVEN {{champion:64}}  CAN SEE that {{champion:82}}  needs SOME FORM OF CC, or he is gonna go hang out with {{champion:6}}  in champion update LIMBO.


no offense to {{champion:6}}  mains out there, if they are out there...

replies.body: Wow, I never knew that Morde didn't have any CC or mobility boost. He is literally the only champion in the game that is like that.

Yes, there is actually a champion, 1 champion with no cc or form of movement. it is sad how bad of a spot he is in and all he needs is one or the other.

I think what hurts the most is how obvious it is that he needs something,

its like looking at "A giant, metal, general of the undead with a giant mace Lumbering towards you" 

and you would feel doomed! thats a great thematic vibe of morde

but then, you realize he can not catch you. LITERALLY. he simply can't. 

( better sacrifice jungler for a cc support to go in lane with him since he has so little...)
